rows.label: tlk70000080_10_msg0002
tlk70000080_10_msg0003
rows.name:
There hasn't been a Driver who
could control the Paragon of
Iira for a long time now...

rows.label: tlk70000080_10_msg0004
rows.name:
We're so lucky to have you,
Laura-sama. And you too Shin

rows.label: tlk70000080_10_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm working as hard as I can to help
you defeat the Holy Grail. Let me know
if there's ever anything I can do.
